amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the prohibition on Weatherization and State Energy Program Funding.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in the Congressional Record to strike the prohibition on Weatherization and State Energy Program Funding.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tonko amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 208 - 223 (Roll no. 57).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Tonko amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 208 - 223 (Roll no. 57).
